mapper.select: SELECT b.subject_no subjectNo ,n.subject_notice_no subjectNoticeNo ,n.member_id memberId ,n.subject_notice_title subjectNoticeTitle ,n.subject_notice_content subjectNoticeContent ,n.create_date createDate ,t.teacher_name teacherName FROM subject_notice AS n INNER JOIN subject_board AS b ON n.subject_notice_no = b.subject_board_no INNER JOIN teacher t ON t.member_id = n.member_id WHERE b.subject_no = #{subjectNo} LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM subject_notice WHERE subject_notice_no = "${subjectNoticeNo}"
